title: raama baNa
sahitya:
rAma bANa trANa shaurya mEmani pogaDudurA O manasA



anupallavi



 bhAma kASabaDu rAvaNa mUla balamula nElagUla jEyu nija



caraNam



 tammuDu baDalina vELa suraripu temmani cakkera pancIyaga gani lemmanucunu 

indarAri balka samayammani lEvagA sammatitO nilabaDi kOdaNDa pUjya ghOSamu 

lAshanula jEsi tA nemmadi gala tODunu jUcEnurA nijamaina tyAgarAja nutuDaku shrI
